item.title: Demoscene as UNESCO cultural heritage and unperformable music
item.description: Demoscene accepted as UNESCO cultural heritage in The Netherlands and topic about unperformable music # The Dutch inscription is continuing the success story of the demoscene as first digital culture accepted by the UNESCO.

item.title: CultureWorldMap
item.description: I hate f*king ~fairyland~ bi tools (lie) # My Tableau CultureWorldMap How do Europeans call something that is too far away # Some maps by Yanko Tsvetkov # Yanko Tsvetkov atlasofprejudice.
